sentences.en: Better be foremost among commoners than the lowest of the aristocracy.
dukes, earls, and other members of the aristocracy
sentences.cn: 公爵、伯爵及其他贵族成员

sentences.en: He married into the French aristocracy.
sentences.cn: 他因婚姻关系跻身于法国贵族.

sentences.en: He objected to the toadying to aristocracy.
sentences.cn: 他反对对于贵族阶级的奉承.

sentences.en: I think an aristocracy ought to be splendid.
sentences.cn: 我总觉得,贵族应该是穿得花团锦簇的.

sentences.en: Norman French was the language of the aristocracy, including the King and his court.
sentences.cn: 诺曼法语是包括国王以及其朝臣们都讲的贵族语.

sentences.en: People said the aristocracy was effete.
sentences.cn: 人们说贵族阶级已是日薄西山了.

sentences.en: Romanos virtually abandoned restrictions the landowning of the aristocracy.
sentences.cn: 罗曼努斯实际上放弃了对于贵族土地所有者的限制.

sentences.en: The aristocracy are too lazy to work, but they seem to get on all right.
sentences.cn: 贵族是个懒骨头,不干活, 可是看来过得不坏.

sentences.en: The early phase of Roman affairs was an aristocracy of a very pronounced type.
sentences.cn: 早期罗马的事务是属于显著的贵族政治类型.

sentences.en: The highest - ranking members of the Spanish aristocracy are the grandees.
sentences.cn: 西班牙贵族中爵位最高的成员乃是大公.

sentences.en: The Howards and Oriscolls were of this aristocracy.
sentences.cn: 霍华德和德利斯科尔这两家正是这种名门望族.

sentences.en: The new drink quickly won friends, especially the Spanish aristocracy.
sentences.cn: 这种新的饮品受到人们极大的喜爱, 尤其是西班牙贵族.

sentences.en: The trader and catcher may yet be a - mong our aristocracy.
sentences.cn: 黑奴贩子和黑奴追捕者们,恐怕还将侧身于我们的达官贵人之列呢.

sentences.en: Why should he object to marrying into our aristocracy?
sentences.cn: 为什么他要反对与我们的贵族联姻 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 贵族的；贵族政治的；有贵族气派的
贵族；贵族统治；上层社会；贵族政治

trans.tran_en: the people in the highest social class, who traditionally have a lot of land, money, and power
